section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion to announce in 73-1162, United States against Wilson and Bryan.
And for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk today, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit is reversed.
Mr. Justice Blackmun with whom Mr. Justice Rehnquist joins filed a concurring opinion.
Mr. Justice Brennan with whom Mr. Justice Douglas and Mr. Justice Marshall joined filed a dissenting opinion.
